about_the_game:
Day of Dragons Original Soundtrack is a professionally-made, 16-track original soundtrack composed by Rey Fernández Jr. and orchestrated by Norman Ludwin. All 16 tracks are completely original and recorded with real instruments in Budapest, Hungary by the Budapest Scoring Orchestra.

The soundtrack is a beautiful composition of professionally recorded music that is both moving and touching and guaranteed to take you on an emotional journey through the world of Dragons. You can own the music featured in Day of Dragons here on Steam with both MP3 (lossy) and high-quality WAV (lossless) files included.

The Day of Dragons Original Soundtrack production & recording was made possible by our 2019 Kickstarter Backers.
